DashboardSection.title: Rose
DashboardSection.subtitle: A rose is either a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae, or the flower it bears.
DashboardSection.funFact: Roses Are One of the Oldest Flowers. It's no wonder that roses have been referenced in literature and music for centuries.

DashboardSection.title: Tulips
DashboardSection.subtitle: Tulips are a genus of spring-blooming perennial herbaceous bulbiferous geophytes. The flowers are usually large, showy and brightly coloured, generally red, pink, yellow, or white.
